Instructions:	Opcode		
add a,b		80		
ld (de),a	12		
ld c,a		4f
ld a,b		78
ld a,c		79			
ld b,c		41		
ld d,*		16
ld c,*		0e
inc e		1c	
jp **		c3	
jp pe,**	ea		
halt		76
ld bc,   **	01
ld (bc),a	02
inc bc		03
inc b		04
dec b		05
ld b,*		06
in a,(*)	db
out (*),a	d3
rlca		07
